channel.title: webdev on Jonathan Piedra
channel.description: Recent content in webdev on Jonathan Piedra

item.title: CSS Tip: 'overflow-x' for Narrow Contexts
item.description: A quick tip that can help handle design cases that include child elements larger than their immediate parent.

item.title: JavaScript Design Patterns: Module
item.description: In the second installation of this series on JavaScript design patterns and their implementation, we take a look at the module pattern. By combining two commonly used features in the language, we can create robust interfaces that hide member variables and methods as we see fit.

item.title: JavaScript Design Patterns: Constructor
item.description: This first installment in a series discussing various JavaScript design patterns covers one of the most basic patterns available, the constructor pattern.
